body_html: I closed it because this depends on the algorithm caching functionality in ProcessGroupGloo, which is going to be nuked very shortly. You mentioned you weren't able to get this to work right? Then we can track the IB support in #8032 and not have both an issue and a PR open for tracking.
body_text: I closed it because this depends on the algorithm caching functionality in ProcessGroupGloo, which is going to be nuked very shortly. You mentioned you weren't able to get this to work right? Then we can track the IB support in #8032 and not have both an issue and a PR open for tracking.
body: I closed it because this depends on the algorithm caching functionality in ProcessGroupGloo, which is going to be nuked very shortly. You mentioned you weren't able to get this to work right? Then we can track the IB support in #8032 and not have both an issue and a PR open for tracking.
